item.description:
Hey ladies,

Figured I would try and sneak in one more meet-up before the holidays:-)

In case any of you have never heard of the BBC; it's a very casual restaurant/bar that has an amazing selection of beers, great apps, and very talented bands.

I don't believe there is a cover and the drinks are somewhat reasonably priced. The band "The Complaints" will be playing the night I am scheduling this meet-up. Not sure what they are like, but hopefully they're decent:-)

Looking forward to seeing many new faces, and many returning members too.

Thanks and hope to see you gals soon!

Lisa
item.name: Let's get into the holiday spirit at the British Beer Company in Walpole!!!
